text:
### Enable Anti-virus scanning service for Vitae

If your subscription has the Anti-virus scanning service enabled, the
**Service settings** tile will be available in the **Settings** page.

In the **Service settings** page, you can turn on the switch at the **Anti-
virus scanning service** row, so that the files that users want to upload to
Vitae will be scanned for virus protection.
